member.name: T:System.IWindowsCrashAnalyticsService
member.summary: Extension to to include Windows UI specific crash handlers.

member.name: P:System.IWindowsCrashAnalyticsService.ExecutionOrder
member.summary: Temporary property to force order of registration and therefore execution of event handlers.

member.name: M:System.IWindowsCrashAnalyticsService.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionHandler(System.Object,System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs)
member.summary: Handle previously unhandled exceptions in an Application.

member.name: M:System.IWindowsCrashAnalyticsService.ApplicationThreadExceptionHandler(System.Object,System.Threading.ThreadExceptionEventArgs)
member.summary: Handle previously unhandled exceptions in WinForm Threads.
